block.p: CATANIA-Andrea, on August 14, 2000. Professor of Law at Seton Hall University School of Law. Loving sister of Lynn Voeffray and Claudia Catania. Treasured aunt of Maxwell and Gavin Cady. Services Thursday, 11:45 AM at ''The Riverside,'' 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue. In lieu of flowers contributions may be made to Seton Hall University School of Law for a scholarship fund in memory of Andrea.
